snippet: Witnesses in the trial of Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan recounted for the first time in public the lengths the shooter went to kill as many soldiers as possible.
abstract: Witnesses in trial of Maj Nidal Malik Hasan recount for first time in public the lengths shooter went to kill as many soldiers as possible when he opened fire at Fort Hood military base in 2009; testimony of 44 witnesses provides account of chaos and panic in medical processing building during attack.
lead_paragraph: Witnesses in the trial of Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan recounted for the first time in public the lengths the shooter went to kill as many soldiers as possible.

headline.main: Witnesses Relive Horror of Fort Hood Attack
headline.print_headline: In Testimony, Witnesses Relive Horror of Fort Hood Attack
